meta.article_title: October 16, 2017 - Top Twelve Tactical Rallying Mistakes

top_twelve_tactical_rallying_mistakes.probleme: Playing too much into the backhand

debutant: Attack the middle (roughly the playing elbow, midway between forehand and backhand)
Use this to set up a follow-up attack to the corners or middle again

exercices_complementaires.description: Make an initial attack to the middle and then set up a follow-up attack to the corners or middle again

erreurs_a_eviter: Attacking an opponent's weak side first rather than first attacking their stronger side
Trying to end the point too quickly
Not ending the point when the shot is there
